text: 105-year-old Vaman Shekhu Lokhande and 100-year-old Sakra Bai Kade are among the 57 freedom fighters from Marathwada who are on a hunger strike at Azad Maidan, Mumbai, since last week. They are demanding the inclusion of their names in the State pension scheme for freedom fighters, pending with the government for the last three decades.— Photo: Arunangsu Roy Chowdhury
title: Fighting to get their due
